name: Idle Funny Factory
description:
"Become the greatest, richest and most popular man in the universe! 
Build your own factory, expand your business empire!
Start with your own factory, hire some managers to help you autocollect money. Unlock and upgrate factories. Take on the challenge and discover the best strategy and earn as much cash as possible.

Features:
- Casual, and easy gameplay.
-Automate your factoroes and earn more idle cash.
-Get idle cash, even when you are offline.
-Hire managers to autocollect cash.
-Play anywhere, even you are offline.
"
